mapper.select: select h.hotelfilename,rh.realhotelname,rh.lat,rh.logt,rh.lotnoaddr,AVG(r.grade),hr.bedno,hr.roomprice,rh.state from hotel h left join realhotel rh on h.realhotelno = rh.realhotelno left join review r on h.hotelno = r.hotelno left join hotel_room hr on h.hotelno = hr.hotelno where rh.state= #{state} group by h.hotelfilename,rh.realhotelname,rh.lat,rh.logt,rh.lotnoaddr,hr.bedno,hr.roomprice,rh.state
mapper.insert: insert into realhotel (realhotelno,state,realhotelname,wstroom,korroom, roadaddr,lotnoaddr,lat,logt,hotelcondition) values(realhotel_seq.nextval,#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{realhotelname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{wstroom, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{korroom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roadaddr, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lotnoaddr, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lat, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{logt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{hotelcondition, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
